title: Vegan mushrooms in cream with dill, garlic and red onion
ingredients: ['1 to 2 teaspoons olive oil', '1 small or medium red onion, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon crushed garlic (or equivalent to 1 large clove)', '1 punnet mushrooms, sliced', '1 small carton soya cream', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 generous handful chopped dill', 'salt and pepper to taste']
